title: RPG SoundScapes - Sound Effects
description: Bring your environments to life with these sounds!
longDescription:
Hi Dev!


In this package you will have access to 26 different ambient sounds for your game!


Check the documentation

Check the preview


RPG SoundScapes

SFX - Dungeon, Stone, Bats, Noises, 01 (00:56)

SFX - Tavern, People. Food, Drinks, (01:08)

SFX - Underwater, Loop, Low, Bubbles, 01 (01:06)

SFX - Volcano, Lava, Hiss, 01 (01:00)


Amount of audio provided: 20 Minutes 52 Seconds


Environment

With these audios you can bring to life the scenes of your environments, with a variety of sounds designed for RPG games, So: Bookstores, Tavern, People Talking, Rain, Day, Night, Volcano, Snow, among others!


Ease

The sounds are already looped undetectably, so all you have to do is drop the sound into your project and you're done! Then just adjust the volume as you see fit for your scene and everything will be working. It's worth remembering that the sounds were also named with details of what makes them up, making searching easier.


Quality

All audio was professionally recorded and edited in post-production, using quality equipment and paying attention to the smallest details to ensure the quality of the files.


Variety

You have 27 different scenarios and a folder with some layers that were used for you to use as you see fit, and a file can be divided into other scenarios depending on your game.


Helping each other / Support

By investing in this package you will be receiving everything described above and will also be motivating me to continue creating, and you can also contact me via email for any questions or support you need.
technicalDetails:

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz
